messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Outgoing CIA Director John Brennan said it would be the height of folly for U.S. President-elect Donald Trump to tear up deal with Tehran. It would make it more likely that Iran and others would acquire nuclear weapons, he said. Brennan also said that in dealing with the Syrian crisis, Trump should be cautious in trying to work with Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Republican congressman Lou Barletta of Pennsylvania said he met with President-elect Donald Trump on Tuesday. He said he discussed becoming his labor secretary.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of Defense Ash Carter voiced opposition to extending a temporary government funding bill. He said it would negatively impact the military, including in the fight against Islamic State. Washington has been operating since Oct. 1 under a stopgap spending bill.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said on Tuesday he hopes to have several of President-elect Donald Trumps Cabinet nominees confirmed on his first day in office. In the past, weve been able to confirm a number of an incoming presidents Cabinet appointments on day one, McConnell said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Trump transition team spokesman Jason Miller said the Cabinet selection would be announced in the early afternoon. Miller did not elaborate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is set to name Indiana health policy consultant Seema Verma as his pick for administrator of the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services. Trump is expected to officially announce his selection of Verma on Monday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has chosen Republican Tom Price of Georgia to be secretary of health and human services, the New York Times reports.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Rep. Lou Barletta of Pennsylvania is considered for transportation secretary, Politico reports.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump appears close to naming Tom Price as secretary of health and human services. Trump could make the announcement on Tuesday, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution reported.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The death of Fidel Castro is unlikely to slow down U.S. efforts to normalize relations with its Cold War enemy, the White House says. White House spokesman Josh Earnest says any move to unwind relations would deal a significant economic blow to Cuban citizens.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

There has been no evidence of widespread election fraud in the Nov. 8 presidential contest, the White House says. President-elect Donald Trumps tweeted over the weekend alleging millions of illegal votes and fraud in three states.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The conversation was one of a handful between the two men since the Nov. 8 election. White House spokesman Josh Earnest declined to say what they talked about.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Green Party nominee Jill Stein is filing requests in Pennsylvania to start a recount of votes. Recount requests were filed on Monday in more than 100 precincts in the state.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Trump will meet with Petraeus on Monday, Corker and Romney on Tuesday. All three have been floated as potential picks to be Trumps secretary of state.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump will meet with retired U.S. General David Petraeus on Monday. Petraeus, a former CIA director, resigned in 2012 after it emerged he had an extra-marital affair.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump called a request for a recount of votes in Wisconsin a scam. He said even his Democratic challenger Hillary Clinton had said the election results should be accepted. This recount is just a way for Jill Stein, who received less than onepercent of the vote overall and wasnt even on the ballot in many states, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The tyrant Castro is dead. New hope dawns. We will stand with the oppressed Cuban people. Viva Cuba Libre! Pence said on Twitter.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry offered his condolences to the Cuban people. Kerry said the United States would continue to support engaging with them after Fidel Castro's death.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan says much work remains to secure the freedom of the Cuban people. Now that Fidel Castro is dead, the cruelty and oppression of his regime should die with him, Ryan says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump says his administration will do all it can to help boost freedom and prosperity for Cuban people. While Cuba remains a totalitarian island, it is my hope that today marks a move away from the horrors endured for too long, Trump says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said Fidel Castros death was an opportunity for the Cuban government to turn the page. While Fidel Castro is gone, sadly the oppression that was the hallmark of his era is not, McConnell said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Barack Obama offered his condolences to Fidel Castros family. Obama added that history would judge Castros impact on Cuba and around the world.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The organization behind the presidential campaign for Jill Stein, along with one other group, on Friday filed a petition with the Wisconsin Elections Commission. The Commission is preparing to move forward with a statewide recount of votes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Don McGahn, a well-known campaign finance lawyer, is to be his White House counsel. K.T. McFarland, a national security analyst, will be his deputy national security adviser.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has recently spoken with the leaders of Greece, Hungary, Panama, Slovenia and Sweden. The leaders of the five nations congratulated the Republican on his Nov. 8 victory.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans meetings with at least eight people on Monday. John Allison, a former chief executive of BB&T Corp, has been mentioned as a possible pick to head the Treasury Department. Trump will also meet with former Securities and Exchange Commissioner Paul Atkins.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Wilbur Ross Jr is the billionaire chairman of private equity firm W.L. Ross & Co. Ross, 78, is known for buying up failed companies.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has tapped wealthy Republican donor and school choice advocate Betsy DeVos to lead the Education Department. DeVos, former chair of the Michigan Republican Party, met with Trump on Saturday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

South Carolina Governor Nikki Haley has accepted President-elect Donald Trumps offer to be the U.S. ambassador to the United Nations. Haley, the daughter of immigrants from India, had backed Marco Rubio and Ted Cruz during the Republican battle for a White House nominee.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Former Republican rival-turned-supporter Ben Carson says he could serve a role under Donald Trump. Carson had been offered the job leading the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras spoke by telephone to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump. The two leaders agreed to maintain steady communication channels.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump has offered the post of secretary of housing and urban development to Ben Carson. Carson, a retired surgeon, dropped out of the 2016 presidential race in March and backed Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Former Democratic Representative Harold Ford Jr of Tennessee is being considered for U.S. transportation secretary or another Cabinet post in Donald Trumps administration. Ford, who served five terms in Congress, has yet to meet with president-elect Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President-elect Donald Trump condemned an alt-right conference in Washington. Some members performed a Hitler salute and yelled Hail Trump! after a speech about white nationalism.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump says he thinks there is some connection between climate change and human activity. Trump met Times reporters and editors in New York. Trump has previously called man-made global warming a hoax.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Trump said no when asked if he would rule out investigating Clinton over her familys charity. But he said he did not want to hurt the Clintons and wants to move on.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Foreign minister Boris Johnson says Britain must underline the importance of free trade and the NATO military alliance to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump. Johnson: "NATO and Article 5 of NATO has been the guarantor of peace and stability in our continent"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Trump said on Twitter that many people would like to see Nigel Farage as British ambassador to Washington. Britain has an excellent ambassador to the United States and he will continue in his work, spokesman says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said many people would like to see Nigel Farage as British ambassador to Washington. David Davis said on Tuesday there was no vacancy for the job.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
UKIP leader Nigel Farage says he is in a good position to help Britain build ties with Donald Trump. U.S. President-elect tweeted that Farage should be British ambassador to Washington.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump says many people would like to see Nigel Farage as British ambassador to Washington. Farage was one of the leaders of the successful referendum fight for Britain to leave the EU.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump released a video on Monday laying out actions he will take on his first day in office on Jan. 20. Trump also said he would issue a rule cutting government regulations, direct the Labor Department to investigate abuses of visa programs.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Washburne is a top Republican fundraiser. He is involved in real estate, restaurants and diversified financial investments. Washburne has served as vice chair of Trump Victory Committee.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Oklahoma Governor Mary Fallin met on Monday with President-elect Donald Trump. A spokesman said they discussed the possibility of Fallin serving at the Interior Department.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Barack Obama says people should take a wait-and-see approach on Donald Trump. Obama said he could not guarantee Trump would not pursue the policy positions he took during the campaign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama calls U.S. House Democratic chief Nancy Pelosi a remarkable leader. Democrats need to fight for their principles but must be willing to work with the incoming administration of President-elect Donald Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama declined on Sunday to comment on media reports. Senior defense and intelligence officials in his administration had requested the removal of National Security Agency chief Mike Rogers. Obama called Rogers a terrific patriot during a news conference in Lima.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Obama says he is not worried about being the last Democratic U.S. president for a while. He added, however, that the Democratic Party needed to organize better and better convey its message.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau says he looks forward to welcoming U.S. President-elect Donald Trump to Canada. Trudeau added that the two heads of state discussed the softwood lumber trade issue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump will hold a series of meetings on Sunday in New Jersey. Trump and Vice President-elect Mike Pence will meet with talent agent Ari Emanuel. They will also meet with New Jersey Governor Chris Christie.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mitt Romney is a possible choice for the job of secretary of state. President-elect Donald Trump is also looking at other people, Reince Priebus said. Priebus also said that Romney and Trump had a very substantive conversation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Conservative radio talk show host Laura Ingraham says she is being considered by President-elect Donald Trump. Ingraham said she has talked to Trump and she was privileged to be considered.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump says he is considering retired General James Mattis for U.S. defense secretary. Trump said in Twitter that Mattis, a retired Marine Corps general, was very impressive yesterday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump will meet on Sunday with billionaire investor Wilbur Ross. Trump, who takes office on Jan. 20, will also meet with others on Sunday, including New Jersey Governor Chris Christie.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Retired Gen. David Petraeus is being considered for the post of defense secretary, the Wall Street Journal reports. Also under consideration as Pentagon chief are retired Marine General James Mattis, retired Army General Jack Keane, former national security adviser Stephen Hadley and former Senator Jim Talent. Keane said on Twitter on Friday that he will not be joining the new administration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Admiral Mike Rogers is the leading candidate to become President-elect Donald Trumps next director of national intelligence, the Wall Street Journal reported. Rogers met with Trump in New York on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Incoming U.S. Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer says he is very concerned about Republican President-elect Donald Trumps selection of Senator Jeff Sessions. Schumer indicated there would be tough questioning in the chambers confirmation process.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

German Chancellor Angela Merkel says U.S. and European leaders did not discuss imposing sanctions against Russia over its military involvement in Syria. Merkel said the leaders had, however, discussed sanctions against Russian over its role in the Ukraine conflict.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President-elect Donald Trump has offered Republican Senator Jeff Sessions the job of U.S. Attorney General. Republican National Committee spokesman Sean Spicer would not confirm the reports.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has offered retired Lieutenant General Michael Flynn the position of White House national security adviser. Flynn, a former head of the Defense Intelligence Agency, advised Trump during the campaign on national security issues.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Abe said the two talked about various issues but refrained from disclosing the contents of the meeting with Trump. He made the comments in New York after a meeting that was intended to smooth relations following Trumps campaign rhetoric.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has offered retired Lieutenant General Michael Flynn the job of national security adviser, the Associated Press reported. The official would not say whether Flynn, a former head of the Defense Intelligence Agency, has officially accepted the job.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Pentagon spokesman Peter Cook said Trumps transition team contacted the Pentagon a short time ago to arrange the initial briefings.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The hastily arranged meeting was an attempt to smooth relations following Trumps campaign rhetoric that cast doubt on long-standing U.S. alliances.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Some members of President-elect Donald Trumps transition team can now begin work with officials at certain government agencies. The new administration will take over in January.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mitt Romney is due to meet Trump on Sunday to discuss the position, NBC News says. Romney, a former Massachusetts governor, was the 2012 Republican presidential nominee.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Arkansas Attorney General Leslie Rutledge says she is open to working in the incoming Trump administration. Rutledge said she wanted to do whatever she could to help roll back regulations that are hurting U.S. businesses.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump and Mike Pence have spoken with nearly 30 foreign leaders since winning the Nov. 8 election. Discussions with many of the leaders, including Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin, were already public knowledge. Leaders from Afghanistan, Iraq and Pakistan were missing from the list.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Sessions is under consideration for secretary of defense and attorney general. He met with Trump on Wednesday in New York.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama says it would be naive to expect a 180-degree turn by Russia or Syrian President Bashar al Assad. Obama spoke at a joint news conference after a meeting with German Chancellor Angela Merkel.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama says he plans to come back to Germany at least one more time. Obama will visit Munichs annual beer-swigging Oktoberfest. Around 7.5 million litres of beer are consumed each year at the event.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Many in Germany expect Merkel to run in a general election next year. U.S. President Barack Obama said he might vote for Merkel if he was German.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Director of National Intelligence said Russia planning on expanding its presence at its naval base in Tartous, Syria. James Clapper also said he did not expect a significant change in Russian behavior when asked about hacking activities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Director of National Intelligence declines to comment on whether Russia shared information with U.S. or Americans. James Clapper: "I rather not respond off the top of my head and in any event this would probably best left to a classified session"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama says he would support any move by President-elect Donald Trump to improve healthcare. During the U.S. presidential campaign, Trump called for the Affordable Care Act to be repealed and replaced.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kremlin expecting signals from the team of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump. Ushakov said he did not rule out contacts with Trumps team before his inauguration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Biden met with Pence and his wife at the vice presidents residence in Washington. He said he would be available to assist Pence at any time.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trumps transition team is weighing an infrastructure bank to make investments in the nations infrastructure. Trump adviser Steven Mnuchin said the team was focused on taxes... regulatory changes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The next step is for the President-elects transition team to provide us with the names of the individuals they have authorized to represent their transition effort.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Rep. Tom Price of Georgia is under consideration to be secretary of health and human services during a Trump administration. Price, the chairman of the House Budget Committee, had endorsed Donald Trumps candidacy in May.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Carson has been a close adviser to Trump and is a vice chairman of his transition team. He has been mentioned as a possible secretary of health and human services or education. Carson's spokesman says he has no experience in running a federal bureaucracy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Rep. Kevin Brady said Republicans should defend free trade. He said the party should defend the Trans Pacific Partnership (TPP) in the new Congress.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

CBS News: Donald Trumps team has asked the White House to explore the possibility of getting his children top-secret security clearances. Daughter Ivanka, sons Eric and Donald Jr. and son-in-law Jared Kushner were close advisers to Trumps campaign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama said on Monday it was important for President-elect Donald Trump to send signals of unity after a bitterly fought campaign. Obama declined to comment on Trumps selection of conservative provocateur Steve Bannon as his White House chief strategist.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama spoke by phone with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto. The presidents agreed to take steps to solidify the relationship.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan praised President-elect Donald Trumps choice of Republican Party Chairman Reince Priebus. Ryan said he has spoken with Trump almost every day since last Tuesdays election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

For-profit education stocks have surged on expectations that President-elect Donald Trump and a Republican Congress may ease regulations. Stocks such as Grand Canyon Education, DeVry Education Group and Capella Education rose about 14 percent last week.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
One person was shot at an anti-Trump demonstration in Portland, police say. Everyone needs to leave the area immediately, police said on Twitter. Police asked witnesses to come forward.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is considering outgoing Senator Kelly Ayotte of New Hampshire for the post of defense secretary. Other people on the list include retired Army Lieutenant General Joseph Keith Kellogg.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump has removed New Jersey Governor Chris Christie as leader of his transition team. Vice President-Elect Mike Pence, a former U.S. lawmaker with deep Washington ties, takes over.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
French President Francois Hollande and U.S President-elect Donald Trump had a phone conversation on Friday. They agreed to work together on a number of key issues in order to clarify positions.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto says he is optimistic about U.S. relations. He says he and Donald Trump have agreed to meet during the transition period.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
CNN: President-elect Donald Trump is strongly considering naming his campaign chief Steve Bannon to serve as White House chief of staff.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Bannon is well liked among Trumps circle of advisers, the Times said. Priebus is said to be viewed favorably by Trumps daughter Ivanka and son-in-law Jared Kushner.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Aides to President-elect Donald Trump are considering Republican Representative Jeb Hensarling of Texas as a candidate for Treasury secretary, the Wall Street Journal reported. Hens Darling told the Journal on Thursday he would certainly have the discussion if the Trump administration came calling.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President-elect Donald Trump says he will work rapidly on issues like healthcare and immigration. Speaking in Ryans office, Trump told reporters: We are going to lower taxes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump says his top three priorities are immigration, healthcare and jobs. Trump spoke to reporters after his meeting with Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell. Earlier Thursday, Trump held meetings with House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan and President Barack Obama.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama believes in the right of Americans to protest the election of Donald Trump. Obama wants people to hear the message that were Americans and patriots before Democrats and Republicans.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The meeting was an important first step for a smooth transition of power, the White House said. Obama came away from the meeting with renewed confidence in the commitment of the president-elect.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Aetna CEO Mark Bertolini says he expects some benefits of Obamacare to stick. Trump has promised to repeal the Affordable Care Act, known as Obamacare, which passed in 2010.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump invited Theresa May to visit him as soon as possible. May and Trump agreed that the U.S.-British relationship was very important and very special. May also told Trump that she hoped to strengthen bilateral trade and investment.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russia is ready to work on improving bilateral relations with the U.S., foreign ministry spokeswoman says. Maria Zakharova says it is premature to expect more specific steps in improving relations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell calls Obamacare the single worst piece of legislation from the first two years of the Obama administration. McConnell says he would like to see bipartisan comprehensive tax reform, and that border security should also be high on the to-do list.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto says he spoke to U.S. President-Elect Trump. He said he had discussed a new work agenda with Trump that would include security issues. The two agreed to meet before he takes office.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Early readings from a Reuters/Ipsos national Election Day opinion poll help explain how the New York real estate magnate eked out his advantage. The poll reading was taken after most but not all  voters were counted in the presidential election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Defense Secretary Ash Carter pledged to oversee an orderly transition to a Trump administration. He thanked Pentagon employees for staying out of the political fray during the 2016 presidential campaign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama hopes the U.S. tradition of people in power not using the criminal justice system against their opponents will continue. Republican President-elect Donald Trumps pledge to jail his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Russian President Vladimir Putin congratulated businessman Donald Trump on his victory. Putin expressed hope for joint work to restore Russian-American relations from their state of crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama intends to brief, rather than lobby, President-elect Donald Trump. White House spokesman Josh Earnest: Viewing some policies from inside the government gives you a new appreciation for the benefits of those policies.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Hassan won by a narrow margin, recording 354,640 votes to Ayottes 353,617. Hassan: "It will be my job in the U.S. Senate to make the best decisions for New Hampshire"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Obama administration remains committed to implementing the Paris agreement on climate change and the Iran nuclear deal, the White House says. Republican Donald Trump, who strongly criticized the Iran deal, will start his four-year term on Jan. 20.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ilmars Rimsevics welcomed Donald Trumps U.S. presidential election win on Wednesday. The European Central Bank ratesetter said the Republican would be a very good president.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu spoke to newly elected U.S. President Donald Trump by phone on Wednesday. Trump invited him to a meeting at the first opportunity, Netanyahus office said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
New Hampshire Governor Maggie Hassan declares that she has won her race for the U.S. Senate. Local media and her rival, incumbent Republican Kelly Ayotte, said the race remains too close to call.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.N. Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said he hopes the administration of Donald Trump will strengthen the bonds of international cooperation. Ban described Hillary Clinton as a powerful symbol of womens empowerment.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

As part of his campaign, Trump vowed that he would build a massive border wall. Ruiz Massieu said that the government had maintained communication with Trumps campaign team ever since his visit to Mexico in August.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko said he hoped the United States would continue to support Ukraine in its stand-off with Russia. The President looks forward to a continuation of U.S support in two important areas.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau congratulated Donald Trump on winning the U.S. presidency. Trudeau said he looked forward to working very closely with Trump and his administration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu congratulates U.S. President-elect Donald Trump. Netanyahu says he looks forward to working with him to advance security, stability and peace in our region.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Dutch far-right politician Geert Wilders said Donald Trumps victory in the U.S. presidential election was a sign that the West was living through a patriotic spring. Wilders, whose anti-immigration, anti-Muslim Freedom Party tops polls ahead of next years parliamentary elections, said mainstream politicians had lost the trust of voters in the West.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
